conflictDescription: User Story A requires continuous data collection with strict privacy control, effectively forbidding free sharing of all user data, while User Story B demands that all personal health data be shared freely. These requirements impose opposite constraints on data sharing, making them mutually exclusive.
userStoryASummary: As a developer, I want to continuously collect all user data with full control over sharing, so I can enforce strict privacy and fine-tune proactive voice reminders.
userStoryBSummary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to share all my personal health data freely, so that I can fully benefit from personalized care and support.
generalResolutionType: 2. Update one and keep one remain the same
resolutionDescription: User Story A is updated to clarify privacy controls allowing selective sharing under user consent, while User Story B remains unchanged to preserve the goal of data sharing for personalized care.
newUserStoryASummary: As a developer, I want to collect user data continuously with strict privacy controls and user-consented sharing, so I can ensure data security and support personalized reminders.
newUserStoryBSummary: As an older person, I want ALFRED to share all my personal health data freely, so that I can fully benefit from personalized care and support.

conflictDescription: User Story A requires continuous collection and sharing control of all user data, implying chat data might be collected and shared, while User Story B strictly forbids chatting with other users during games, which conflicts with continuous data collection involving social interactions.
userStoryASummary: As a developer, I want to continuously collect all user data with full control over sharing, so I can enforce strict privacy and fine-tune proactive voice reminders.
userStoryBSummary: As an older adult I want ALFRED to block all chatting with other users during games to protect my privacy and avoid all social interactions.
generalResolutionType: 2. Update one and keep one remain the same
resolutionDescription: User Story A is updated to exclude collection of chat data during games to respect the privacy and social blocking required in User Story B, which remains unchanged.
newUserStoryASummary: As a developer, I want to continuously collect all user data except chat data during games, so I can enforce privacy and fine-tune voice reminders.
newUserStoryBSummary: As an older adult I want ALFRED to block all chatting with other users during games to protect my privacy and avoid all social interactions.
